context.p: Hardware represents both independent blades and standalone rack servers.
Create a new Hardware within the PDU OSS Deployment Tracking Tool.

prereq.p: To create a new Hardware the user must have the following:

info.p: Click the Hardware link in the navigation bar.
Click the Create new Hardware button.
Enter the details as shown below.
NOTE: Any restrictions on the fields are outlined.

ul.li: Hardware Deployment ID: ID of Hardware Deployment.

li.lines: Time Free Information: This field defines how long the Hardware has been free. NOTE: This field is automatically set by the tool and cannot be manually adjusted. When the Hardware is created or dissociated from a Deployment, the field is given a timestamp representing the moment the Hardware became free. The timestamp is used to get an accurate measurement (days) on how long the Hardware has been free. When the Hardware is associated with a Deployment, the field becomes undefined which represents that the Hardware is now in use.

info.p: Click the Save button, the Hardware will be created, and the user will be redirected back to the view page for the newly created Hardware.
NOTE: Hardware will not save if any fields are invalid (invalid fields are highlighted in red).

result.p: A New Hardware is created in the PDU OSS Deployment Tracking Tool.
